resources.string: On long press, consider nearer elements, higher the number, higher the coverage
Let active screen on follow GPS
Consider closest elements on long press
Record the GPS point on time interval. When Zero, records as receiving GPS information
On follow mode, record point for each second specified.
Record the GPS point on distance interval. When Zero, records as receiving GPS information
On follow mode, record point for each distance from the last point specified.
Sets the time between each sending and receiving of data with the server.
Sets the time between each sending and receiving of data with the server.
